body_html: That tf.contrib.layers.linear link should probably be removed. There are no op links for the other activation function aliases (partial objects), tf.contrib.layers.relu or tf.contrib.layers.relu6, on the Python API Guides page. I can remove the @{tf.contrib.layers.linear} line from the docs_src file and submit a pull request, but I think that I might first check that all other @{} links work (at least on the tf.contrib.layers page.)

body: That `tf.contrib.layers.linear` link should probably be removed.  There are no op links for the other activation function aliases (partial objects), `tf.contrib.layers.relu` or `tf.contrib.layers.relu6`, on the Python API Guides page.  I can remove the `@{tf.contrib.layers.linear}` line from the [`docs_src` file](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/api_guides/python/contrib.layers.md) and submit a pull request, but I think that I might first check that all other `@{}` links work (at least on the `tf.contrib.layers` page.)
